title: [Large-scale] Course for Strengthening Computer Science and Human-Computer Interaction Competencies for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and general understanding of digital environments
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment based on andragogy principles, integrating informal learning experiences via MOOCs, providing digital devices, and applying project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Adult learners can apply fundamental principles of human-computer interaction (HCI) to develop and implement prototypes for solving real-life problems.
Learners can understand core concepts of computer science (such as algorithms, data representation, etc.) and complete collaborative projects based on them.
Learners can deepen their understanding of difficult concepts by integrating MOOCs (non-formal learning) with formal courses and produce outcomes incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
